jrtr

Class GLVertexData

  • java.lang.Object
    • jrtr.VertexData
      • jrtr.GLVertexData

  • public class GLVertexData
extends VertexData
    An implementation of VertexData which adds the handle to the OpenGL vertex array object (VAO) of this vertex data to it.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class jrtr.VertexData
